title: Awaken 4.0.4 (MacHeist 2)
description:
Awaken 4.0.4
Wake up to your music

* Alarms
Create a weekly or specific date alarm to wake you with your favorite music or any of the built in sounds.

* Sleep Timer
Fall asleep with the sleep timer, which can also put your Mac to sleep.

* Egg Timer
Use the egg timer for quick one-time alarms like taking a quick nap or timing the oven.

* Wakes Your Mac
Let your Mac sleep through the night. Awaken will handle waking your Mac at alarm time.

* Backup Alarm
If iTunes has a problem at alarm time, the backup alarm will wake you.

* Fullscreen Mode
View the alarm and sleep timer from across the room with fullscreen mode.

* Podcast Support
Wake up or fall asleep listening to your favorite Podcast.

* Volume + Screen Fade
Fade in the volume and screen brightness for alarms and out for the sleep timer. 

* Apple Remote
Control the alarm and sleep timer from across the room with your Apple remote. 

* Menubar
Enable the Awaken menubar app to allow alarms to trigger while Awaken is not running.

* Software Update
Awaken uses the Sparkle framework which allows for seamless updates.

* Universal
Awaken is built and designed to run natively on both Intel and PowerPC Macs.

System Requirements
Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger or higher
iTunes 6.0 or higher
 <a href="
http://embraceware.com/software/awaken/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://embraceware.com/software/awaken/</a>

-------------------

Double click SN# after mounting the .dmg to get the license info.  In program update to 4.0.11 works perfectly.

(Part of the MacHeist 2 bundle)
